column2: Alpha Black calling Papa Bear. The US Army Base is under NATO control once more. Objective One complete. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. We've swept the surrounding area; it looks secure. Request you send in the reinforcements. Over
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. The US Base is firmly under our control. We are done here. Alpha out.
Bravo to team Alpha. The LZ's in sight, appears cold. Prepare to descend by fast roping. Good luck. Bravo out.
Alpha leader, this is Charlie squad. Be advised, we're here to help you secure the base. Out.
Alpha Black, this is Papa Bear. Roger that. Sweep the area and use your radio to call in the reinforcements when you think it's safe. Out.
Papa Bear to Alpha team. Received and acknowledged. Reinforcements on the way. Out.
Papa Bear calling Alpha. Black. Your mission is accomplished. That was an important job. Nice work. Out.
